project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of their score, and displays it at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored in a variable inside the code.

task.name: Define the questions and answers variable
Create a function to display the questions and accept user input
Implement scoring logic to keep track of correct answers
Create a function to display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests to validate the functionality of the game components
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure they function correctly
